0.text: Innate: Gwen's basic attacks  on-hit, the center of  Snip Snip!, and  Needlework deal bonus magic damage equal to 1% (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health.

1.text:
Thousand Cuts is modified based on the target:
 Heals Gwen for 60% of post-mitigation damage dealt against  champions, capped at 10 − 25 (based on level) (+ 6.5% AP) per instance.
Deals an additional 8 − 30 (based on level) bonus magic damage against  minions that are below 40% of their maximum health.
Deals a maximum of 10 (+ 15% AP) magic damage against  monsters.

0.text: Passive: Gwen's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Snippy for 6 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.

1.text: Active: Gwen snips at least twice with her scissors in a cone in the target direction over the cast time, dealing magic damage per snip to all enemies within the area, with the final snip dealing increased damage. The center of each snip deals  true damage instead and applies  Thousand Cuts.

1.content: 9 / 12 / 15 / 18 / 21 (+ 5% AP) (+ 1% (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health)

3.content: 45 / 60 / 75 / 90 / 105 (+ 25% AP) (+ 1% (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health)

2.text: If Gwen has any Snippy stacks, she consumes them to snip an additional time for each.

1.content: 54 / 72 / 90 / 108 / 126 (+ 30% AP) (+ 2% (+ 1.6% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health)

3.content: 90 / 120 / 150 / 180 / 210 (+ 50% AP) (+ 6% (+ 4.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health)

0.text: Active: Gwen summons the Hallowed Mist upon her current location, lasting for 5 seconds. Hallowed Mist can be recast after 0.5 seconds, and does so automatically if Gwen attempts to leave the area.

1.text: While inside the mist, Gwen gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance and is  untargetable to all enemies (except  turrets and  monsters) outside of the mist.

2.text: Recast: Gwen commands the mist to move to her current location.

3.text: Gwen negates all attacks by  monsters outside of the mist.

0.text: Active: Gwen  dashes to the target location, and afterwards she gains 10 (+ 15% AP) bonus magic damage  on-hit on her basic attacks,  bonus attack speed and  50 bonus attack range for 4 seconds.

1.text: Gwen's first basic attack within the duration refunds 50% of Skip 'n Slash's  cooldown.

2.text: Skip 'n Slash  resets Gwen's basic attack timer, and can be cast during any of her abilities, and vice versa. Skip 'n Slash will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Gwen can activate Needlework up to 3 times, launching needles in the target direction with each cast. Each needle deals magic damage to enemies hit and  slows them for 1.5 seconds. For each individual target, needle hits beyond the first  slow by a reduced amount.

1.content: 30 / 55 / 80 (+ 8% AP) (+ 1% (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health)

1.text: Within 6 seconds after the first cast, Gwen needs to hit a basic attack, which has an  uncancellable windup, or  Snip Snip! to unlock the second cast. After using the second cast, the duration is refreshed and she may repeat the aforementioned requirement to unlock the third cast. Each subsequent cast increases the number of needles launched by 2.

0.content:
270 / 495 / 720 (+ 72% AP)
 (+ 9% (+ 7.2% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health)

2.text: First cast: Gwen launches one needle.

 (+ 1% (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health)
